posts.author: Empyre65
posts.content: It is impossible, or at least very difficult, to have both Paladin and Barbarian in the same build. A Paladin must be Lawful Good, but a Barbarian must not be Lawful.

posts.content: We can change alignment. Devastating critical has been disabled. Must have at least 5 levels of Paladin.
